original_title: Former aide set to testify in GOP probe about Biden’s mental fitness for office | CNN Politics
article_summary: Former Biden aide Ian Sams testifies before the House Oversight Committee in a GOP-led investigation into allegations of a "cover-up" of Biden's mental decline and potential unauthorized executive actions, including sweeping pardons. Other aides, including Anita Dunn and Steve Ricchetti, have defended Biden, denying any nefarious conspiracy or hiding of Biden's mental condition.</s>
